title: Kapin 200 ka negosyante sa Visayas mikat-on og AI alang

title: Output growth forecast for Taiwan semiconductors increased
description: The government-supported Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI) has raised its forecast for 2025 growth in the output value of Taiwan's semiconductor industry to above 22 per cent on strong global demand for artificial intelligence applications, Focus Taiwan reported.
